patterns: How can I see my attendance?
responses: You can view your attendance on the dashboard under the 'Attendance' section.
Log into your account and check the 'Attendance' tab to see your attendance.

patterns: How can I modify attendance records?
Is there a way to change attendance details?
responses: Attendance can only be updated by authorized personnel. Please contact your lecturer or admin for assistance.
Modifications to attendance are restricted. Please reach out to your lecturer or system administrator.

patterns: What subjects am I enrolled in?
How can I see my courses?
responses: You can view your enrolled courses in the 'Subjects' section after logging in.
Go to the 'Subjects' page to see the courses you are registered for this semester.
You can find lecturer details in the 'Lectures' section or under each subject's information.
Log in and go to the 'Lectures' tab to see who is teaching your subjects.

patterns: Do I have a lecture today?
responses: You can view your lecture schedule on the 'Lectures' page.
Check the 'Lectures' tab to see your upcoming lecture times.

patterns: Am I enrolled in this subject?
How do I know if I am enrolled?
responses: You can view your enrollment status under the 'Enrollment' section in your account.
Log in and navigate to the 'Enrollment' page to confirm your course registrations.

patterns: What happens if I miss too many classes?
Tell me about the attendance rules
responses: The minimum attendance requirement is 75%. Missing more may affect your eligibility for exams. Please review the full attendance policy on our website.

patterns: How can I reset my password?
responses: You can reset your password by clicking 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Follow the instructions sent to your email.

patterns: What is my role in the system?
Am I a student or lecturer?
How can I see my user role?
responses: You can view your role under your profile settings. The system assigns roles based on your registration as a student, lecturer, or admin.

patterns: Is there a support team I can reach?
Can I talk to someone for help?
responses: You can contact support through the 'Contact Us' page or via email. Our support team is available to help with any issues.

patterns: How do I navigate the website?
Where can I find my dashboard?
responses: The dashboard is available after you log in. You can access the 'Attendance' section from the main menu.
Use the top menu to navigate to 'Attendance', 'Subjects', 'Lectures', and more.

patterns: How can I update my profile?
I need to change my personal details
Where can I edit my information?
responses: You can update your profile by going to 'Account Settings'. From there, you can modify your details such as name, email, and more.

patterns: How do I apply for leave?
Can I submit a leave request?
What is the process for applying for leave?
responses: To apply for leave, go to the 'Leave Application' section on your dashboard, fill in the necessary details, and submit the form.

patterns: Can you tell me about the attendance system?
What is the purpose of this website?
responses: This is a student attendance management system where you can track your attendance, view course information, and manage your academic profile.
